title: Five Cases - Novel Updates
tags: Bickering Couple   Cohabitation   Crime   Genius Protagonist   Investigations   Kind Love Interests   Modern Day   Murders   Mystery Solving   Past Trauma   Police   Romantic Subplot   Seme Protagonist   Younger Love Interests
author: 天良永动机
description:
Lu Hui is a genius, but he has an odd temperament. 

The director of Linhua City’s Bureau of Public Safety, Gao Zhengcheng, personally invited Lu Hui to head the serious crimes division, taking over to solve particularly tricky homicide cases. 

And so opens Linhua City’s collection of cases.>
